entry.title: WIND WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
